name: Wheelie Man
description:
This is my first ever game on Unity. It is a 2d platformer with 6 different levels where you go from left to right and get to the finish and collect as many coins as you can. The last level is a vertical platformer, but all the other levels are left to right. Please Enjoy!

Download Instructions-

Download is for Windows 10 Devices only. I may learn how to integrate to web later.

After downloading Zip file, unzip it. Inside the new folder is an exe which you click to play the game.
